TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputLanguage extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法和字段以管理输入语言。

span.span: Provides methods and fields to manage the input language.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的语言是区域性/键盘布局对确定如何键盘上的物理键映射或绘制于一种语言中的字符。An input language is a culture/keyboard layout pair that determines how the physical keys on a keyboard map or plot to characters in a language. 输入的语言基于 Windows 的输入区域设置标识符，如平台 SDK 函数，返回`GetKeyboardLayout`。The input language is based on a Windows input locale identifier, such as that returned by the Platform SDK function, `GetKeyboardLayout`. 输入区域设置标识符也被称为键盘布局 (HKL) 值的句柄。The input locale identifier is also called a handle to a keyboard layout (HKL) value. 使用`static`提供给查找所有已安装映射的系统和更改的线程或进程的输入的语言的方法。Use the `static` methods provided to find all installed mappings of the system and to change the input language for a thread or process. 调用获取当前输入语言。Call to get the current input language. 调用默认的输入语言。Call for the default input language. 调用在此系统中获取所有已安装的语言。Call to get all the installed languages in this system. 所有已安装的语言的列表后，使用更改当前输入语言到另一种语言。After you have a list of all the installed languages, use to change the current input language to a different language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取已安装的语言的列表。The following code example gets a list of installed languages. 该示例需要`textBox1`已实例化且`textBox1.MultiLine`已设置为`true`。The example requires that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一个示例为当前输入语言设置的默认输入的语言。The next example sets the default input language as the current input language. 该示例需要`textBox1`已实例化且`textBox1.MultiLine`已设置为`true`。The example requires that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取当前输入语言。The following code example gets the for the current input language. 文本框中显示此输入语言和输入语言的名称。A text box displays this input language and the name of the input language. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated. MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage FromCulture (System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage FromCulture(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromCulture (culture As CultureInfo) As InputLanguage
public: static System::Windows::Forms::InputLanguage ^ FromCulture(System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);

span.span: The that specifies the culture to convert from.

summary.span: 返回与指定区域性关联的输入语言。

span.span: Returns the input language associated with the specified culture.
An that represents the previously selected input language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法选择从已安装的键盘。The method selects from among installed keyboards. 具体而言，此方法执行以下操作：Specifically, this method performs the following operations: 1. 获取与关联的 LCID `culture`。Gets the LCID associated with `culture`. 2. 从获取可用的输入的语言标识符 (Hkl) 的完整列表`GetKeyboardLayoutList`函数。Gets the full list of available input language identifiers (HKLs) from the `GetKeyboardLayoutList` function. 3. 查找对应于从 LCID HKL `culture`，如果有的话。Finds the HKL that corresponds to the LCID from `culture`, if one is present. 4. 返回与该 HKL 关联的已安装的键盘。Returns the installed keyboard associated with that HKL. 5. 如果不找到任何键盘，则返回`null`。If no keyboard is found, returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 方法永远不会尝试加载或如果其中一个不已安装的安装其他键盘`culture`。The method never tries to load or install an additional keyboard if one has not already been installed for `culture`. 使用平台 SDK 函数`LoadKeyboardLayout`，若要安装其他键盘。Use the Platform SDK function, `LoadKeyboardLayout`, to install an additional keyboard. ## Examples 下面的代码示例为当前输入语言设置的默认输入的语言。The following code example sets the default input language as the current input language. 首先，调用以获取系统默认语言。First, is called to get the system default language. 接下来，调用以获取当前输入的语言。Next, is called to get the current input language. 在文本框中输出的结果。The results are printed in a text box. 然后，调用使用默认的输入的语言的当前输入的语言更改为默认值。Then, calling with the default input language changes the current input language to the default. 在文本框中显示新的当前输入的语言。The new current input language is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取所有已安装输入语言的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of all installed input languages.

span.span: An array of objects that represent the input languages installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索计算机上安装的所有输入的语言，并显示其名称。The following code example retrieves all the input languages installed on the computer and displays their names. 该代码调用以获取已安装的语言。The code calls to get the installed languages. 文本框中显示的语言名称的列表。A text box displays the list of language names. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化且`textBox1.MultiLine`已设置为`true`。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在当前键盘布局名称出现在计算机操作系统的区域设置中时获取该名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the current keyboard layout as it appears in the regional settings of the operating system on the computer.
The name of the layout.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取当前输入语言与关联的区域性，并显示区域性名称。The following code example gets the culture associated with the current input language and displays the culture name. 首先，调用以获取当前输入的语言。First, is called to get the current input language. 然后，调用以获取此输入语言的区域性信息。Then, is called to get the culture information for this input language. 最后，检索并将其显示在文本框中。Finally, is retrieved and displayed in a text box. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
